issues.name: I invited someone and didn't recieve my invite
issues.explationation:
Make sure your link is your own (NOT **discord.gg/buxloot**)
Heres how:

issues.name: InviteTracker says I have x invites, BuxBot doesn't
issues.explationation: BuxBot is a new bot, it will only track **new invites**

issues.name: How do I increase my multipler
issues.explationation: Your multipler increases every x invites, more invites, higher multipler
